direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods validate that an object is not null and throw a ValidationException if it is.
Both methods validate that an object is not null but with different exception messages.
Both methods handle null validation with similar control flows and exception handling but with different message formats.
Both methods handle null values and throw ValidationException, though one checks arrays and the other single objects.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods might require a validation context to be initialized before execution.
Environment setup might be required before validating objects.
Both methods verify non-null conditions and handle similar exceptions.
